dcterms:description: Data collected from the speaking section of the Test Of English as a Foreign Language (TOEFL), containing speech responses for a total of 24 test items, scored by experienced human raters using a 4-point holistic scoring scale.
dcterms:title: Test Of English as a Foreign Language (TOEFL)

dcterms:description: Responses used for training reference vectors (RVs) in the context of automated speech scoring, derived from the TOEFL dataset.
dcterms:title: Responses used for training reference vectors (RVs)

dcterms:creator: Klaus Zechner
Xiaoming Xi
dcterms:description: Responses used in previous studies for automated scoring, specifically referenced in the context of Zechner and Xi (2008) and Xie et al. (2012).
dcterms:title: Responses used in previous studies

dcterms:description: Human-rated scores used for evaluating the performance of the VSM-derived features in speech scoring.
dcterms:title: Human-rated scores (HS)

dcterms:description: Machine-predicted scores used as an alternative to human-rated scores for training reference vectors in automated speech scoring.
dcterms:title: Machine-predicted scores (AS)
